item.title: Dogepedia
item.description: Dogepedia is the resource containing Documentation, Guides, FAQs and Resources related to Dogecoin. The place to be for all shibes trying to learn about Dogecoin and crypto. Such knowledge! Much wow! Documentation Dogecoin The basics. Learn what Dogecoin is, and how it works. What is Dogecoin? What is the history of Dogecoin? How does Dogecoin work? Who owns and controls the Dogecoin network? I want some Dogecoin! How can I get it?

item.title: Resources
item.description: A list of resources created by shibes that can be useful to work with Dogecoin and to research it. Tools to Monitor and Study Dogecoin and its Network SoChain - Dogecoin chain explorer. Dogechain - Dogecoin chain explorer. Blockcypher - Dogecoin chain explorer. Blockshibe - monitor the work of miners and mining pools. Developed by Patrick Lodder, Dogecoin Core developer. Blockchair - monitor the number and versions of Dogecoin nodes in the network.
